title: Rek'Sai Unburrowing is TERRIBLE
body:
So whenever you right click on an enemy while burrowed as Rek'Sai, you unburrow.

This is literally the worst part of her kit. It makes smart casting near any minions impossible and it's way too easy to screw up in a hectic team fight. If someone is burrowed, trust me when I say they know when they want to unburrow. Having the right click do it for them is painful and incredibly annoying. Please change this for the love of the void.
